1351020.name: RPG Maker MZ - 3D Particle Effect Pack
1351020.description:
You want to impress your game players with animations effects? Here you have it with this brand new 3D particle effects animation pack! Featuring 100 very usable and important effects that your characters can use to bring excitement and bright action to the big screen!

Features:

Effects: 100 kinds such as:

・Arrow
・Axe
・Book
・Breath-Darkness / Earth / Fire / Ice / Light /Thunder / Water / Wind
・Claws
・Cross-Claw / Hit / Pierce / Slash
・Darkness
・Earth
・Explosion
・Fire
・Firework
・Flail
・Flowers: Claw / Hit / Pierce / Slash
・HeartMark
・Hit
・Ice
・Light
・Meteorite
・Neutral
・Pierce
・Poison
・Protection
・Reflection
・Rod
・SanskritEffect
・Scythe
・Shield
・Shoot
・Shout
・Slash
・Smokescreen
・Song
・StarClaw
・StarEffect
・Star - Pierce / Hit / Slash
・Thunder
・Water
・Whip
・Wind
